name: End Zone [Demo]
description:
Explore a brand-new retro DOOM style game where you play as a lonely prisoner who has been captured by a company that tests and creates man-made beasts!

You are armed with only a single pistol. Your objective is to find out what this company is planning to do whilst trying to escape.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Controls:
W/A/S/D to Move around
Space to jump
C to crouch
Shift to Sprint
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
